SELECT IFNULL(A.UR_IDX , '' ) AS UR_IDX /* 회원IDX */ , IFNULL(A.USER_ID , '' ) AS USER_ID /* 회원ID */ , IFNULL(A.USER_NAME , '' ) AS USER_NAME /* 이름 */ , IFNULL(A.USER_BIRTHDAY , '' ) AS USER_BIRTHDAY /* 생년월일 */ , IFNULL(A.USER_CONTACT1 , '' ) AS USER_CONTACT1 /* 연락처1 */ , IFNULL(A.USER_CONTACT2 , '' ) AS USER_CONTACT2 /* 연락처2 */ , IFNULL(A.USER_STATUS_CODE , '' ) AS USER_STATUS_CODE /* 상태 */ , IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT , '%Y%m%d') , ' ' ) AS REG_DT /* 등록일시 */ , (SELECT COUNT(*) reserveCnt FROM DC_RESERVE_MASTER WHERE UR_IDX = A.UR_IDX AND RESERVE_STATUS_CODE in ('예약', '대여중', '반납') AND RESERVE_STATUS_CODE != '취소' ) AS RESERVE_CNT /*대여횟수*/ FROM DC_USER_INFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN DC_COMMON_CODE B ON B.RT_CODE='RL' AND A.USER_ROLE = B.CODE
ORDER BY A.REG_DT DESC

SELECT IFNULL(UR_IDX , '') AS UR_IDX /*모델 IDX*/ , IFNULL(LICENSE_IMG_NAME , '') AS LICENSE_IMG_NAME /*이미지 IDX*/ FROM DC_USER_LICENSE_INFO
AND UL_IDX =#{ulIdx}

SELECT IFNULL(T1.LICENSE_CODE , '' ) AS LICENSE_CODE /*면허종류CODE*/ , IFNULL(T1.LICENSE_EXPIRATION , '' ) AS LICENSE_EXPIRATION /*갱신기간*/ , IFNULL(T1.LICENSE_ISSUE_DT , '' ) AS LICENSE_ISSUE_DT /*발급일*/ , IFNULL(T1.LICENSE_LOCATION , '' ) AS LICENSE_LOCATION /*면허지역*/ , IFNULL(T1.LICENSE_NUMBER , '' ) AS LICENSE_NUMBER /*면허번호*/ , IFNULL(T1.LICENSE_OWNER_NAME , '' ) AS LICENSE_OWNER_NAME /*면허소유자명*/ , IFNULL(T1.LICENSE_IMG_NAME , '' ) AS LICENSE_IMG_NAME /*면허 사진*/ , IFNULL(T1.LICENSE_NUMBER2 , '' ) AS LICENSE_NUMBER2 /*면허 번호2*/ , IFNULL(T1.LICENSE_USER_BIRTHDAY , '' ) AS LICENSE_USER_BIRTHDAY /*면허자 생년월일*/ , IFNULL(T1.LICENSE_USER_NAME , '' ) AS LICENSE_USER_NAME /*면허자 이름*/ , IFNULL(T1.MOD_DT , '' ) AS MOD_DT /*수정일시*/ , IFNULL(T1.MOD_ID , '' ) AS MOD_ID /*수정자*/ , IFNULL(T1.REG_DT , '' ) AS REG_DT /*등록일시*/ , IFNULL(T1.REG_ID , '' ) AS REG_ID /*등록자*/ , IFNULL(T1.UL_IDX , '' ) AS UL_IDX /*면허idx*/ , IFNULL(T1.UR_IDX , '' ) AS UR_IDX /*회원iDX*/ FROM DC_USER_LICENSE_INFO T1 WHERE T1.UR_IDX = #{urIdx}

SELECT COUNT(T1.T1.LICENSE_CODE) FROM DC_USER_LICENSE_INFO T1
AND T1.UR_IDX = #{urIdx}
